Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs. We're offering this extraordinary piece to you at a special price of $9500. Considering its worth to you is estimated at $10000, this offer presents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive price. We're confident you'll find this investment worthwhile. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
